ps1.3:0.3: Ānāpānassati → ānāpānassatī (thag10.3:2 [Mahākappinattheragāthā]) | Ānāpānassatikathā → ānāpānakathā (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1, mr)
ps1.3:1.1: ānāpānassatisamādhiṁ → ānāpānasati samādhiṁ (bj); ānāpānasatisamādhiṁ (pts-vp-pli1) | samadhikāni → samādhikāni (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1, csp1ed)
ps1.3:1.2: paripanthe → paribandhe (mr) | satokārissa → satokārīsu (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1) | ti → apānanti (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1, mr)
ps1.3:61.6: tiṇasantharo → tiṇasanthāro (bj, pts-vp-pli1); tiṇasaṇṭharo (sya-all) | palālasantharo → palāsasanṭharo (sya-all); palālasanthāro (pts-vp-pli1)
ps1.3:117.3: avaṭṭhiti → adhiṭṭhiti (sya-all) | avisāhaṭamānasatā → avisāhatamānasatā (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1, mr)
